Dimension Summative

In this assignment you'll build a scene in which you'll map brand artwork in a photograph in three dimensions.
Apps Used:

Topics

  • Die Lines
  • Duotones
  • Spot Colour Channels
  • Beautiful Line Art
  • Prepress Skillz
  • Brushes
  • Pastel Drawing
  • Page Layout Formative
  • Page Layout Output
  • Page Layout Summative
  • Dimension
  • Dimension Summative

Watch the Video Tutorial

Your Assignment

Your assignment is to create a scene of your own containing objects with decals applied. The assets youâ€™ll need are:

  1. a background photo that contains a flat surface
    • You're encouraged to take your own photo to use in your scene.
    • See the stock photo library for source photos.
  2. add at least one object from the Adobe Dimension asset library
  3. an .obj file to import into the scene
    • See TurboSquid for .obj files.
  4. your own custom artwork, including a logo, to use as a decal.
    • You're encouraged to use your own brand to map onto objects in the scene.

Once the scene is created, you will in integrate it with text to create a magazine ad for your product. This magazine ad should contain promotional text such as a tagline, or a title with support text.

Your final piece should be 8.5 x 11 inches.

Students will be marked on understanding of basic design concepts, including typographic rules, alignment, balance, white space, composition, etc.

You may choose to exclude the background from your render depending on the layout of your magazine ad.

  • Technical: 60%
  • Understanding of Design Concepts 30%
  • Design Quality + Effort: 10%

This is a summative assignment. It evaluates your mastery of the skills in this instructional unit. This assignment contributes to your final grade in the course. You will earn a letter grade.

Your Grading System

Supplemental Links

  • Brands of the World
  • TurboSquid

Submission Instructions

Create a PDF of your final ad named

Appleseed-Johnny-#-Dimension Summative.pdf

Don't compress the PDF. Submit it as a PDF.

Create a folder containing all your working files for all the programs used to create your PDF (Dimensions, Photoshop, InDesign, Illustrator, etc). Name the folder:

Appleseed-Johnny-#-Dimension Summative

Make a second submission with the resulting zip file.

Failure to submit your files as directed will incur a proportional loss of points. If your file/folder is not named with your name, you will earn a zero. Why?

Submit Your Files
